attributes.action: ensure that mps have life experience in the work arena before entering parliament,there ensuring that they understand the issues facing people in the work place.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel mps that come straight in to politics from school, to university,to being an mp does not give them enough experience of the real world ,therefore they live in a cacoon within the westminster bubble.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
